localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

previous.excerpt:
Since mid-February, most green energy stocks are down, including the following
ETFs:

TAN: -21%

ICLN: -22%

PBW: -23%

QCLN: -20%

The drop appears to be across the whole sector. Has green energy moved from a
correction to a bear market? And if so, why?
previous.title: Green energy: correction or bear market?

localize.title: 绿色能源：修正还是熊市？
localize.the_new_excerpt:
自2月中旬以来，大部分绿色能源股都在下跌，包括以下几只
ETFs。

TAN：-21%

ICLN：-22%

PBW：-23%

QCLN：-20%

跌幅似乎是整个行业的。绿色能源是否已经从一个 "小 "的领域转向了一个 "大 "的领域？
修正为熊市？如果是，为什么？

localize.title: 綠色能源：修正還是熊市？
localize.the_new_excerpt:
自2月中旬以來，大部分綠色能源股都在下跌，包括以下幾隻
ETFs。

TAN：-21%

ICLN：-22%

PBW：-23%

QCLN：-20%

跌幅似乎是整個行業的。綠色能源是否已經從一個 "小 "的領域轉向了一個 "大 "的領域？
修正爲熊市？如果是，爲什麼？

next.excerpt:
I am Canadian and currently still reside in Canada. I had the pleasure (before
Covid) of having a job that took me all over the US. I've worked in TX, ND, WY,
OK, COL.

And you know what I found?? Everyone was generally fucking nice, not just
Canadians...Sorry lol. I loved being around the locals,…
next.title: What's better... Millions of new Millionaires, or a couple corrupt Billionaires?? 🤔

localize.title: 什么是更好的... 数百万新的百万富翁，或一对夫妇腐败的亿万富翁？🤔
localize.the_new_excerpt:
我是加拿大人，目前仍居住在加拿大。我有幸（在
Covid）的工作，让我走遍了美国。我在德州、北达科他州、怀俄明州工作过。
好吧，上校。

你知道我发现了什么吗？每个人都是一般他妈的好， 不只是
加拿大人......对不起lol。我喜欢和当地人在一起，... ...

localize.title: 什麼是更好的... 數百萬新的百萬富翁，或一對夫婦腐敗的億萬富翁？🤔
